description:
Let our Expert Citysearch Scouts across the country show you the best, newest and coolest local businesses in your city. We promise our all-new, bold design and layout will help you improve your looks, personality, and city searching experience. Okay, maybe just the last one, but still, if you're looking for where to eat, drink and get pampered in your neighborhood or on-the-go, the all-new Citysearch app is the what you've been waiting for. Featuring 'Guides' - our  highly visual lists built by Citysearch's expert scouts to help users easily find new favorites or must try places from across the country. From Philadelphia's "Soups So Good They're Almost Worth Getting The Flu Just to Use Them as Medicine" to spots "Where Beer Nerds and Foodies Collide" in Houston, the new Guides offer you a photo centric way to browse and explore content based on the criteria most important to you. 

Let our Scouts also show you 'What's Hot' - awesome new businesses that have opened near you within the last few months. We've also made the Best of Citysearch browsing experience better and more visual, whether you're exploring a new neighborhood or your own stomping ground. You can submit tips and photos and save your favorites straight to your profile. 

Key features include: 

• Browse our expert scouts' visual Guides to your city

• Check out the Best of Citysearch results displayed visually in your city

• Review business details including address & phone, maps & directions, deals, sentiment, quick tips, user reviews and more! 

• Keyword or nearby specific category searches

• Save your favorite businesses and/or share business details via email

• Browse Citysearch recommended businesses around you

• View all of your business ratings, photos and saved businesses in your own personal view
